C++ Special Math Functions

See the current API documentation.

The portion of math special functions that has been accepted into C++17 are also documented at the usual C++ sites: cppreference and W3cub.

The ROOT library from CERN has implementations of these funtions and a few others.

The Boost library has these special functions and many other mathematical tools as well.

An HTML extraction of the relavant portion of the C++ standard is available from Tim Song.

I'd love to hear from you about all topics C++ and/or maths.
